June Havoc (November 8, 1912  March 28, 2010) was a Canadian-born 
American actress, dancer, writer, and theater director. Havoc was a child 
vaudeville performer under the tutelage of her mother, Rose Thompson Hovick. 
She later acted on Broadway and in Hollywood, and stage directed, both on ... 
Sondheim, and Arthur Laurents Broadway musical Gypsy: A Musical Fable.
